html:
2025-0845
2025-11-28232015DNDTougher Penalties for Child Predators ActOrder Fixing the Day on Which this Order Is Made as the Day on Which Section 32 of the Tougher Penalties for Child Predators Act Comes into ForceOrder fixing the day on which this order is made as the day on which section 32 of the Tougher Penalties for Child Predators Act comes into force in order to amend the National Defence Act (NDA) to align the type and process for evidence in the military justice system with the civilian criminal justice system by allowing a signed certificate by an appropriate authority to be accepted as evidence (certificate evidence)N/A
act: Tougher Penalties for Child Predators Act
subject: Order Fixing the Day on Which this Order Is Made as the Day on Which Section 32 of the Tougher Penalties for Child Predators Act Comes into Force
precis: Order fixing the day on which this order is made as the day on which section 32 of the Tougher Penalties for Child Predators Act comes into force in order to amend the National Defence Act (NDA) to align the type and process for evidence in the military justice system with the civilian criminal justice system by allowing a signed certificate by an appropriate authority to be accepted as evidence (certificate evidence)
